name: Kill 3 Goblins
info: Goblins have been ruining all my walks outside town. I will pay to have some of them taken out.

name: Kill 3 Slimes
info: Slimes are disgusting! Will pay for removing some of these vile creatures from our land.

name: Kill 3 Orcs
info: Orcs have been ruining all my walks outside town. I will pay to have some of them taken out.

name: Kill 2 Wolves
info: Wolves are dangerous! Will pay for removing some of these vile creatures from our land.
